name: Dice Puzzle Blitz - Block Game with Tournaments
name_original: Dice Puzzle Blitz - Block Game with Tournaments
description:
Are you ready to play a fast & addictive block-morphing puzzle game? Match 3 or more of the same dice pieces to score points and clear board space in a super fun puzzle game!

Play head-to-head against players from around the word for real money & cash prizes!

Amazing Gameplay!
- Score points by morphing 3 or more dice pieces
- 2x your Score! Merge 2 sets of dice at the same time
- Connect 3 or more Bombs to earn max points
- Quick! 4 minutes to beat your opponent!

Challenge people from around the word to win real money! Climb the leaderboard, win cash, and earn many prizes!

Test your puzzle game skills today!
